Package nl.mtvehicles.core.infrastructure.dependencies

Class VaultUtils

java.lang.Object
nl.mtvehicles.core.infrastructure.dependencies.VaultUtils
public class VaultUtils extends Object
Methods for Vault soft-dependency.
Beware!
Do not initialise this class directly. Use DependencyModule.vault instead.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    VaultUtils()
    Default constructor which sets up Vault-linked economy plugin - do not use this.
    Use DependencyModule.vault instead.

      Deposit money into player's account
      Parameters:
      p - Player
      amount - Amount of money
      Returns:

    • withdrawMoneyPlayer

      public boolean withdrawMoneyPlayer(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer p, double amount)
      Remove/Withdraw money from player's account
      Parameters:
      p - Player
      amount - Amount of money
      Returns:
      True if the withdrawal was successful, otherwise false (usually due to insufficient funds).

    • getMoneyFormat

      public String getMoneyFormat(double amount)
      Get an amount of money in a string format (e.g. 23.8901 -> '$23,89'). This uses format specified by your economy plugin.
      Parameters:
      amount - Amount of money
